definition: (idiom) not want to be outdone/not content to lag behind
to enjoy the benefits of the hard work of one's predecessors. (idiom)
pinyin: qian2 ren2 zai1 shu4 , hou4 ren2 cheng2 liang2

sentences.english: Billions years ago, human had moved from ocean to land and dominated the earth;
sentences.chinese: 亿万年后人从陆地走向森林，选择水岸。

sentences.english: Cloud deep very despise the keepers of the later generations.
sentences.chinese: 云深很不屑那个牧羊的后人。

sentences.english: The influence of he to posterity is clear.
sentences.chinese: 金圣叹的评点对后人的影响也是显而易见的。

sentences.english: If I am to be judged by those who come after me, let me be judged by the truth.
sentences.chinese: 倘若后人要评判我，我唯愿他们据实以判。

sentences.english: Remember that history, and your children, will judge you.
sentences.chinese: 记住，你的功过得失，历史和后人自会评判。

sentences.english: Mortuary later picked up 40 people survived Gai, also a Canadian and bandit buried in tombs edge.
sentences.chinese: 后人殓拾40人遗赅时，亦一并将强盗尸首葬于墓边。

sentences.english: Here has become martyrs Remembrance of the past later pondered the historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 这里已成为后人凭吊先烈追忆往事的历史遗址。

sentences.english: Misers are no fun to live,but they make great ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 与吝啬鬼生活毫无乐趣，但他们却为后人称道不已。

sentences.english: However, claims from the descendants of Greek victims continued to be made.
sentences.chinese: 然而，来自希腊受害者后人的赔偿要求仍源源不断。

sentences.english: Their "standing in the spirit of Mexico" was the main thrust of future generations widely famous.
sentences.chinese: 其“墨海中立定精神”的主旨被后人广为传颂。

sentences.english: People call the broken rock Sword-power-test Rock.
sentences.chinese: 后人便把这块断裂成三块的巨石叫“试剑石”。

sentences.english: No one will be sure what man will look like in a million years.
sentences.chinese: 没人知道百万年后人会是什么样子。

sentences.english: His poems are considered to be" A great reform to Tang Poetry".
sentences.chinese: 他的诗歌被后人评价为“唐诗之一大变”。

sentences.english: What kind of legacy do you want to leave behind?
sentences.chinese: 你想要给后人留下什么样的遗产？

sentences.english: For even if I cannot bear playing second fiddle patriotic ashes, and I am also patriotic.
sentences.chinese: 平生爱国不甘后人，即使把我烧成灰，我也是爱国的。

definition: worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
lit. to erect a stele and write a biography (idiom)/to monumentalize/to glorify/to sing the praises of
